title: The International Campaign for the Issue of the Honorable Ones
line1: The campaign for the issue of the honorable ones has been formed to
line2: support the oppressed people of Palestine, and it invites you,
line3: dear ones who possess ideas, thoughts, organizations, or any resources and equipment
line4: to support the people of Palestine, to join forces and engage in activities.
line5: We hope that together, through cohesive action,
line6: we can work towards a better future for the people of Palestine.
line7: To join the campaign, please visit the 'Registration' section.
name: |  Name
